Instruction: Mix 2 cups of water, lentils, cumin, garlic powder, and 1 teaspoon of salt in a pot over medium heat; bring the mixture to a simmer. Lower the heat and cook until the lentils start to soften, which should take about 20 to 30 minutes.
Remove from heat and let stand, covered, for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions and cook, stirring, until they are browned, approximately 7 to 10 minutes. Spoon the onions over the rice and lentil mixture; serve.
